#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int n,k,i,j,m,x;
	
	scanf("%d", &n);
	scanf("%d", &m);
	
	int a[n];
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		
	vector < pair<int,int> > v;
	
	for(k=0;k<m;k++){
		scanf("%d", &i);
		scanf("%d", &j);
		
		v.push_back(make_pair(i,j));
	}
	
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	
	vector <int> b;
	
	b.push_back(v[0].first);
	
	for(i=1,k=v[0].second;i<m;i++){
		if(v[i].first < k+1)
			if(v[i].second <k+1);
			else
				k=v[i].second;
		else{
			b.push_back(k);
			b.push_back(v[i].first);
			k=v[i].second;
		}
	}
	
	b.push_back(k);
		
	v.clear();
	
	sort(a,a+n);
	
	for(i=j=k=x=0;i<b.size() && j<n;i=i+2){
		for(k=j;j<n && a[j]<b[i];j++);
		
		x=x+j-k;		
		
		for(;j<n && a[j]<b[i+1]+1;j++);
	}
	
	if(j<n)
		x=x+n-j;
	else;
	
	printf("%d\n", n-x);
	
	b.clear();
		
	return 0;
}
